Author: GitHub
Description:
Join GitHub's Sharryn Napier and Flipkart's SVP, Guddeti Bharat Reddy, for an insightful discussion on how AI is fundamentally reshaping enterprise innovation, culture, and leadership.

In this exclusive conversation, Bharath offers a rare look into how one of the world's leading e-commerce companies is approaching an AI-first future. Discover how Flipkart prepared its talent and processes for an AI-led future, and how they use a "responsible by design" framework to ensure speed and assurance.

Title: Tech Talks | Season 1, Episode 2 | Guddeti Bharat Reddy, SVP, IT, Security & Onetech Ops, Flipkart
